channel.title: Sigourney Weaver on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sigourney Weaver on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sigourney Weaver Reviews ‘Alien: Earth’: “More Profound” Than an ‘Alien’ Movie
item.description: The ‘Alien’ star gives her take on FX’s acclaimed series, which is heavily inspired by her 1979 film.

item.title: Sigourney Weaver Reviews ‘Alien: Earth’: “More Profound” Than an ‘Alien’ Movie
item.description: The ‘Alien’ star gives her take on FX’s acclaimed series, which is heavily inspired by her 1979 film.

item.title: Noah Hawley on ‘Alien: Earth’s’ New Monsters: “Worse Than You Can Imagine”
item.description: The ‘Fargo’ creator returns to FX with a haunting take on the classic science fiction franchise, with brand new creatures along for the ride.

item.title: Noah Hawley on ‘Alien: Earth’s’ New Monsters: “Worse Than You Can Imagine”
item.description: The ‘Fargo’ creator returns to FX with a haunting take on the classic science fiction franchise, with brand new creatures along for the ride.

item.title: What Summer Camp Is Like for the Kids of the Hollywood Elite
item.description: Out: s’mores, Color war and Bug Juice. In: Haute Cuisine Foodstations and Olympic-sized arenas at amenity-packed, culturally sensitive New England compounds. Having fun yet?
